bike.description: S-Works FSR FACT 10M carbon main triangle, Az1 construction. M5 alloy rear triangle, full cartridge bearing pivots and rear shock mount, Magnesium shock link, carbon reservoir mount, 120mm travel

components.description: Specialized AFR Shock w/ Flow Control valve, adjustable Trail Tune range, adjustable rebound, 7.625x1.625"
1 1/8" threadless, integrated alloy cups, sealed cartridge bearing
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Protective clear ccoat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
